name: C4/C5 Recovery Plan
goal: Restore deltoid and biceps function post C5 nerve root injury

exercises.name: Supine Passive Range of Motion (PROM)
exercises.description: Gentle arm movements assisted by therapist or caregiver
exercises.instructions: Support arm at wrist and elbow, move through comfortable range

exercises.name: Deltoid Activation with e-stim
exercises.description: Electrical stimulation to deltoid with attempt at voluntary contraction
exercises.instructions: Apply e-stim pads, stimulate deltoid while attempting contraction

exercises.name: Arm Bike (Ergometer) Passive Mode
exercises.description: Motor-assisted arm cycling to improve range and circulation
exercises.instructions: Secure arm to ergometer, run passive cycle for 5 minutes
